```{python}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
wdi = pd.read_csv("wdi.csv")
```

## Overview
- Course: QTM 350 — Literate Programming with Quarto
- Dataset: World Development Indicators (2022)
- Goal: Summarize key indicators and highlight patterns

## Data
- Source: World Bank WDI
- Observations: 217 countries
- Indicators: 14 (economic, health, labor)

## Focus Indicators
- GDP per Capita
- Life Expectancy
- Unemployment Rate

## GDP per Capita vs Life Expectancy
```{python}
#| label: s-fig-gdp-life
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "GDP per Capita vs Life Expectancy (2022). Source: World Bank WDI (2022)."

plt.figure(figsize=(8,6))
plt.scatter(wdi["gdp_per_capita"], wdi["life_expectancy"])
plt.title("GDP per Capita vs Life Expectancy (2022)")
plt.xlabel("GDP per Capita (current US$)")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (years)")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
```

## Top 10 Countries by Unemployment Rate
```{python}
#| label: s-fig-unemp
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Top 10 Countries by Unemployment Rate (2022). Source: World Bank WDI (2022)."
top10_unemp = wdi.nlargest(10, "unemployment_rate")

plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.bar(top10_unemp["country"], top10_unemp["unemployment_rate"])
plt.title("Top 10 Countries by Unemployment Rate (2022)")
plt.xlabel("Country")
plt.ylabel("Unemployment Rate (%)")
plt.xticks(rotation=45, ha="right")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```

## Key Stats Table
```{python}
#| label: s-tbl-summary
#| echo: false
#| tbl-cap: "Summary statistics for key 2022 indicators — GDP per capita, life expectancy, unemployment rate. Source: World Bank WDI (2022)."
key_indicators = ["gdp_per_capita", "life_expectancy", "unemployment_rate"]
summary_table = wdi[key_indicators].describe().T[["mean","min","max"]].round(2)
summary_table
```

## Key Findings (Text Summary)
- Wide dispersion in GDP per capita and unemployment
- Positive relationship between income and longevity
- Labor market outcomes vary substantially across countries

## Conclusion
- Simple, reproducible workflow with Quarto
- These indicators provide a compact view of prosperity, health, and labor conditions
